name: Scientific Fish Attack
description:
Scientific Fish Attack !

In this breathtaking horror game you will discover the mystery of the scientific fish. 

Walk across a forest and find the truth about the mysterious fish.

TUTORIAL

WASD To Move. F To Use Flashlight. Space To Jump.

! WARNING ! 

You are going to get a lot of goosebumps ! 

Good luck !

PS: This game was made for the ShittyHorrorJam. We made this game intending it to be bad. So if you think that our game is a bad horror game, we've done a good job !
